title: TheCrypto360
author: TheCrypto360
created_time: March 15, 2023, 10:39:42 AMLast edit: April 18, 2023, 06:09:31 AM by TheCrypto360
content: Bounty Campaign (84 Days - 12 Weeks) Token Website   ANN   Whitepaper OxChange Finance bounty pool : 20,000 OC TokensBounty Rounds are as follows:━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Round 1 : 16th March to 12th April - 50 = 10,000 OCRound 2 : 13th April to 10th May - 30 = 6,000 OCRound 3 : 11th May to 07th Jun - 20 = 4,000 OCThe allocation is as follows:━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━YouTube Video Creation Campaign : 25%Blogging Campaign (Medium, Reddit, Others): 15%Twitter Campaign : 15%Facebook Campaign : 15%Telegram Campaign : 05%Translation Campaign : 05%Signature Campaign : 20%Regulations:━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━1. You must fill in the application form.2. Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx.3. You can join the bounty campaign at any time. In order to receive the reward, you must participate until the end of the campaign.4. Negative trust members i.e. using multi-accounts, cheating, using someone else's work and spamming, multiple signature for the same users or any kind of unethical behaviour for the sake to involve in fraudulent activities will be banned from the campaign and payment will be denied.5. There will be limitations of your connections to enter in our bounty campaign.6. Each accepted campaign member is to receive the reward in OxChange Finance $OC Tokens. We’ll offer you tokens after audit and $OC tokens are to be transferred to you after 4 weeks of the end of the campaign.7. The bounty manager can make slight changes in bounty campaign if they consider it necessary.8. All participants are required to join our Telegram Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance.9. The list of channel members is being updated constantly. Reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.10. We won't change the Binance Smart Chain BEP20 wallet address you provided us. Don't lose the private key and don't get phished. Also, Facebook and Twitter followers, the moment you enter our campaign is final and won't be updated.YOUTUBE VIDEO CREATION CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- You’ve to create videos about OxChange Finance Token and AMM Platform on your channel of YouTube.- OxChange Finance Token Website - https://oxchange.finance/- You can create 1 video per Week i.e. 4 videos in 4 Weeks.- Subscribe our Official OxChange Finance Youtube Channel.- Any hunter who wants to participate in OxChange Finance's bounty program via YouTube Video Creation Campaign, Channel must be related to the crypto currency.- The video description must include these hashtags #OxChangeFinance #OxChange #OC #OXchange #concentratedliquidity #gasless #decentralizedexchange #blockchain #cryptocurrency #technology #bitcoin #money #crypto #Polygon #MATIC #cryptocurrencies #fintech.- Any language is accepted.- Sound and video quality must be high, although webcam and smartphone videos are accepted.- Content must be unique and original.- The more views you accumulate, the more tokens you will be allotted.- All views will be counted after the end of the campaign and will reward its creator accordingly.- The video must be more than 1 min in length.- No hate speech, racism, the religious or personal attack. The content must be respected and mannerful in all ways.- Channel should have at least 300 subscribers.- Rewards will depend on quality and viewers of the uploaded video.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:YouTube Channel Name:YouTube Channel Link:Number of Subscribers:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Task Completion Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Your Video description must contain your Bitcointalk username and Binance Smart Chain wallet address for confirmation.- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Code:Reporting Week Number:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:YouTube Channel Name:Number of Subscribers:YouTube Channel Link:Created Video Link:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Distribution of stakes━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Low quality  —  10 stakes + 20 stakes if it reaches 5k viewsFair quality  — 20 stakes + 20 stakes if it reaches 5k viewsHigh quality — 30 stakes + 20 stakes if it reaches 5k viewsWhat Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: YouTube Video Creation Campaign participants will receive stakes in the bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of YouTube Video Creation Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all YouTube Video Creation Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Fill in the form here:  Form Check the statistics here:  Statistics BLOGGING CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Eligibility━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- Follow us on Medium : https://medium.com/@oxchange.finance- Follow us on Reddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/oxchange/- Only one account per person is allowed.- The account must be at least 1 month old.Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- You’ve to create stories, articles or blogs about OxChange Finance Token and OxChange Finance Platform on your profile of medium, reddit or any blogging account.- Content must be original and should not be copied from others.- Articles must contain a link to our Website - https://oxchange.finance/, TG group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance and Whitepaper - https://docs.oxchange.finance/ as well as Social Medias.- Link to your bitcointalk profile must be found.- Article must contain minimum of 500 words.- The post must remain active until the bounty campaign finishes.- You have to perform these above tasks one time a day (2 post every week i.e. 8 posts per round). No spamming.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:Blog Platform Name:Blog Platform Username:Blog Profile Link:Number of Followers:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Task Completion Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Your Blog must contain your Bitcointalk username and Binance Smart Chain wallet address for confirmation.- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Code:Reporting Week Number:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:Blog Platform Name:Blog Platform Username:Blog Profile Link:Number of Followers:Posted Blog Links:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Distribution of stakes━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Low quality — 10 stakes per blogFair quality —20 stakes per blogHigh quality—30 stakes per blogWhat Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: Blogging Campaign participants will receive stakes in the bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of Blogging Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all Blogging Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Fill in the form here:  Form Check the statistics here:  Statistics TWITTER CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Eligibility━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/oxchangefinance- Only one Twitter account per person is allowed.- You should have at least 300 followers on your twitter account to participate in bounty campaign.- Your Twitter account needs to have at least 85% real followers, verified with https://www.twitteraudit.com/- The account must be at least 1 month old.Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Follow our Official OxChange Finance Twitter Account.- Create atleast 5 Tweets about OxChange Finance Token or OxChange Finance Platform every week with few of these hashtags #OxChangeFinance #OxChange #OXchange #concentratedliquidity #gasless #decentralizedexchange #OC #blockchain #cryptocurrency #technology #bitcoin #money #crypto #Polygon #MATIC #cryptocurrencies #fintech and mention @oxchangefinance in the post. [Post must be organic]- You’ve to Like and Retweet atleast 5 tweets every week of OxChange Finance Twitter Account with hash tag #OxChangeFinance #OxChange #OXchange #concentratedliquidity #gasless #decentralizedexchange #OC #blockchain #cryptocurrency #technology #bitcoin #money #crypto #Polygon #MATIC #cryptocurrencies #fintech.- The post must remain active until the bounty campaign finishes.- You have to perform these above tasks one time a day. No spamming.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:Twitter Username:Twitter Profile Link:Twitter Followers:Binance Smart Chain Wallet address: Task Completion Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Code:Reporting Week Number:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:Twitter Username:Twitter Profile Link:Twitter Followers:5 Tweet Links:5 Retweet Links:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Distribution of stakes━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━300–1000 followers — 1 stake1001–3000 followers — 2 stakes3001–above followers — 3 stakesWhat Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: Twitter Campaign participants will receive stakes in the OxChange Finance bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of Twitter Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all Twitter Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Fill in the form here:  Form Check the statistics here:  Statistics FACEBOOK CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Eligibility━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- Like and Follow our Official OxChange Finance FACEBOOK PAGE - https://www.facebook.com/oxchangefinanceofficial/.- Only one Facebook account per person is allowed.- You should have at least 300 friends at your Facebook account to participate in bounty campaign.- The account must be at least 1 month old.Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Like & Follow our Official OxChange Finance FACEBOOK PAGE.- Don’t forget to make your privacy settings open, your profile should be public.- Create atleast 5 Posts about OxChange Finance Token or Platform every week with few of these hashtags #OxChange #OXchange #concentratedliquidity #gasless #decentralizedexchange #OC #blockchain #cryptocurrency #technology #bitcoin #money #crypto #Polygon #MATIC #cryptocurrencies #fintech. [Post must be organic]- You’ve to Like and Share atleast 5 posts every week of OxChange Finance Facebook Account with hash tag #OxChange #OXchange #concentratedliquidity #gasless #decentralizedexchange #OC #blockchain #cryptocurrency #technology #bitcoin #money #crypto #Polygon #MATIC #cryptocurrencies #fintech.- The post must remain active until the bounty campaign finishes.- You have to perform these above tasks one time a day. No spamming.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:Facebook Username:Facebook Profile Link:Facebook Friends:Binance Smart Chain Wallet address: Task Completion Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Code:Reporting Week Number:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:Facebook Username:Facebook Profile Link:Facebook Friends:5 Post Links:5 Shared Post Links:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Distribution of stakes for each rank━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━300–1000 friends — 1 stake1001–3000 friends — 2 stakes3001–5000 friends — 3 stakesWhat Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: Facebook Campaign participants will receive stakes in the OxChange Finance bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of Facebook Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all Facebook Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Fill in the form here:  Form Check the statistics here:  Statistics TELEGRAM CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance, which will give you 10 stakes.- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- Wear our avatar + OxChange Finance name extension which will give you +90 stakes, only if you have joined our Official Telegram group. Example: Harry | OxChange Finance |- Avatar for Telegram - Download here.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:Binance Smart Chain Wallet address: What Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: Telegram Campaign participants will receive stakes in the OxChange Finance bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of Telegram Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all Telegram Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Fill in the form here:  Form Check the statistics here:  Statistics TRANSLATION CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- You’ve to translate BitcoinTalk Bounty and Announcement thread in selected language and support it until the end of the Campaign.- Reserve translation language and get confirmation before starting localization.- Russian, Spanish, French, German, Turkish, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, Korean, Japanese, Indonesian, Filipino, Urdu, Hindi, Thai, Vietnamese translations are required.- Google Translator (or other similar tools) work, bad quality work will get you disqualified, apply only if you are able to provide a high quality translation and having command on requested language.- After filling-up the form, reply in the bounty thread your previous portfolio as well as the language you want to translate. We will send you a PM on Telegram if you're accepted.- There will be only ONE Language per person. Applications for multiple languages will not be accepted.- You have 10 days to complete the translation once we give you confirmation of your reservation.- You will get 100 stakes per translation, and an additional 10 stakes per new page translation in the thread.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:Translation Language:Portfolio/experience/previous translations links:Binance Smart Chain Wallet address: Task Completion Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.- Send your progress report here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Code:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:Translation Language:Translated Announcement Post Link:Translated Bounty Campaign Post Link:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: What Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: Translations Campaign participants will receive stakes in the OxChange Finance bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of Translations Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all Translations Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Fill in the form here:  Form Reply in the bounty thread with your portfolio (Authentication Post) and the language you wish to translate.Check the statistics here:  Statistics SIGNATURE CAMPAIGN━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Tasks━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Register yourself by filling the registration form.- Join Telegram Official Group - https://t.me/Oxchange_Finance- Join Telegram Bounty Group - https://t.me/+r-y_esKLN0AwZWIx- You should be at least JR member to participate OxChange Finance Signature Campaign. Wear the signature before applying to get accepted.- Set your Signature, avatar according to your rank and have to be kept until the end of the campaign.- Must wear Avatar.- You should at least post minimum 5 meaningful posts per week. (Off-topic, spam and burst posts will not be counted). If you’ll unable to manage 5 meaningful posts per week for continuously 2 weeks, you’ll get disqualified.- You may not advertise any other sites in your signatures.- We will only count post on bitcoin and altcoin discussions.- Posts in any signature campaign or bounty threads will not count.- We will only count 1 max posts in the local board in a week.- Users may not change payment addresses, You will use the same address the whole campaign.- Posts are counted every Wednesday.- Posts must have a minimum length of 75 characters.- Accounts with negative trust from DT-2 or DT-1 are not allowed to enroll.- Send your progress report here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Authentication Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Code:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:Binance Smart Chain Wallet address: Task Completion Post━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━- Due to lots of spam, we would ask you to post some proof here.- Send your progress report weekly here in BitcoinTalk Bounty Thread of OxChange Finance, reply on our bounty thread with your task completion report including authentication details.Code:Reporting Week Number:Bitcointalk Username:BitcoinTalk Profile URL:Telegram Username:5 Post Links:Binance Smart Chain Wallet Address: Rates━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Jr. member  - 5 stakes/weekMember - 10 stakes/weekFull member - 15 stakes/weekSr. member   - 20 stakes/weekHero/Legendary  - 25 stakes/weekWhat Are Stakes?━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Example: Signature campaign participants will receive stakes every week during the OxChange Finance bounty campaign. At the end of the campaign, each member’s bounty amount of $OC tokens will be calculated in this way:(Total amount of Signature Campaign $OC tokens / Total amount of all Signature Campaign participant’s stakes) * Member’s stakesNote: Your bounty will be paid in OxChange Finance (OC) tokens.How to Participate━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Apply the signature from below and fill in the form here:  Form Check statistics here:  Statistics Download AvatarJr. Member━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━Quote══════════════☛OxChange Finance☚═════════════Gasless Decentralised Exchange on Polygon Chain!
